about_the_game:
Welcome to Infinite Void!


Embark on an intergalactic journey in this retro-inspired side-scrolling space shoot 'em up roguelike that promises an infinite cosmos of excitement and challenge. Brace yourself for a relentless gameplay loop where you start each level at the heart of the solar system and fight your way to the outer reaches, confronting enemies and cosmic challenges along the way.

Key Features:

Endless Exploration:
Dive into procedural generated universes and solar systems, ensuring a unique experience with each new game. No two cosmic landscapes are alike, offering an ever-evolving challenge for even the most seasoned pilots.

Dynamic Gameplay Loop:
Engage in a captivating loop where every level is a battle from the sun to the system's edge. Face powerful bosses every 5 levels, upgrade your ship or pilot's stats every 10 levels, and make crucial decisions by choosing new special abilities or sticking with the ones you have after every level.

Simple Controls, Diverse Platforms:
Choose your preferred control scheme, whether it's WASD and spacebar, arrow keys and mouse clicks, or the smooth precision of a controller. Adapt the game to your play style and dominate the cosmic battleground with ease.

Ever-Changing Universe:
With each death, you'll have the chance to choose a new pilot and ship combo, diving back into the unpredictable expanse of the "Infinite Void." Experience a fresh start as the universe reshapes itself, offering an endless array of challenges and opportunities.

Immerse Yourself in Retro Aesthetics:
Relive the glory days of classic side-scrolling shooters with pixel-perfect visuals.

Get ready to navigate the "Infinite Void," where every journey is a new cosmic odyssey, your choices shape the destiny of the galaxy. Will you become a legendary pilot, conquering the ever-expanding universe, or will you succumb to the challenges of the celestial expanse? The choice is yours in Infinite Void.
